Successfully updated the app name from **"AutoDx"** to **"VisibleDx"** throughout the entire application:

### **Updated Files (22 instances total):**

### **Changes Made:**
- âœ… Browser tab title now shows "VisibleDx: ME/CFS Â· Long COVID Â· POTS"
